text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of Liberal Democratic Party. He was in the House of Representatives in the Diet of Japan. On September 3, 2007, due to the financial scandal, he resigned as Minister of Agriculture just eight days after he was appointed to the post. Endo died of pneumonia on December 27, 2019 in Yonezawa, Yamagata at the age of 81.元農相 遠藤武彦氏 死去 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Yamagata Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan
title: Takehiko Endo
